titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit nonparty multicandidate political committee contributions in elections for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/6/2001--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit nonparty multicandidate political committee contributions in elections for Federal office.
